about: I am a seasoned Full Stack Developer with 7 years of experience, specializing in React and JavaScript technologies. Proficient in building dynamic and responsive user interfaces, designing RESTful APIs, and integrating frontend and backend components for end-to-end solutions. Strong expertise in state management (Redux), server-side development (Node.js), and both SQL and NoSQL databases. Well-versed in Agile methodologies, CI/CD practices, and collaborative team environments.
